sqlMap.statement:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @NO := @NO + 1 AS ROWNO, EAIBZWKDSTCD , BZWKDSTICNAME , TRACKASISKEY1NAME , TRACKASISKEY2NAME , BZWKDSTICDESC FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM01, (SELECT @NO := 0) R
EAIBZWKDSTCD LIKE CONCAT( '%' , UPPER(#searchEaiBzwkDstcd# ), '%' )
ORDER BY EAIBZWKDSTCD ) ORGTABLE WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTALCOUNT FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM01
EAIBZWKDSTCD LIKE CONCAT( '%' , UPPER(#searchEaiBzwkDstcd# ), '%' )
